posts.post_content:
Not a Chance,

but a Smith with a very nice White Cap.

SGC 40 with a Piedmont 350 reverse.

Let's be Frank, the card was $44 shipped, now $39 shipped.  Or combine him with Lee (Quillin) (listed separately) for $67  shipped.

He looks like he would be happy to come your way.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10601/smith-f-no-f[/IMG]
